name: MIG Welding Tools,8sets,Chipping Hammer,Leather Welding Gloves 13.5",Soapstone Holder,50LB Welding Magnet,Welpers Pliers 8",MIG Nozzle Reamer,Wire Brush
short_description: ●High carbon steel chipping hammer,heat treated,10-1/2-Inch overall length.1-1/16" width chisel to remove welding slag faster
●Leather welding gloves are heat and flame resistant,have a comfortable cotton lining,fully welted seams,and lock-stitch construction
●Welding magnet 50lb 2pc, heavy duty multi-purpose magnetic angle holder, 4-3/4 in,for easy welding, tacking or soldering,precise angles support work at 45°, 90°, and 135°

●Multi-purpose Welpers pliers:clean nozzle,draw and cut wire,remove and install tips,nozzles and insulation bushings,alloy steel heat treated,have aggressive teeth on nose and pipe jaws for secure hold
●Use a MIG Nozzle Reamer, the hardened steel blades cut away the metal spatter, clearing the nozzle for better gas flow and wire feed, which helps prolong nozzle life and reduce wire sticking
●Flat and round soapstone holder with soapstone chalk, 5pcs flat and 45pcs round soapstone replacement, mark white clear and removable markings
●Heavy duty wire brush,11" Overall Length, the Bristle length is about 1", 4X15 Rows of bristles for excellent coverage
product_details: Included Components ‎50LB Welding Magnet, Chipping Hammer 10.5", Wire Brush 11", Leather Welding Gloves 13.5", MIG Nozzle Reamer, Welpers Pliers 8", Welding Soapstone Holder, Round and Flat

name: YESWELDER Switchable Arrow Welding Magnet 2 Pieces 33-44LBs On/Off Switch Arrow Magnetic Welding Holder
short_description: POWERFUL HOLDING FORCE: Featuring robust magnets embedded in the welding holder, these durable magnets boasts a strong magnetic holding force of up to 44Lbs/20kg, ensuring reliable performance.

MULTI-ANGLE CAPABILITY: The innovative arrow-shaped design provides exceptional angle-holding versatility, supporting 45°, 90°, and 135° positions for precise workpiece alignment. Free up your hands for safe, precise and efficient welding.

ON/OFF SWITCHABLE: The magnet features an on/off switch that lets you activate or deactivate the magnetic field. This makes it easy to attach, remove, and reposition the magnet on your workpiece as needed.
PREMIUN DURABILITY: Constructed from premium materials, these magnets are designed for long-lasting performance and resistance to wear and tear, ensuring they remain reliable even with heavy use.
WIDE-RANGE APPLICATIONS: Ideal for use as a holder and positioner in welding, soldering, marking off, and pipe installation, showcasing its versatility across different tasks.

OPTIMAL SIZE AND WEIGHT: Carefully crafted to provide a balance between strength and maneuverability, making it easy to position while still offering ample holding force. Package includes 2 Pieces of 33-44LB switchable on/off welding magnet.
